wordGroup: bear the brunt 首当其冲；承受打击
bear the brunt of 首当其冲

sentences.en: Young people are bearing the brunt of unemployment.
sentences.cn: 失业对年轻人的冲击最大。

sentences.en: The fjords and islands of Chilean Patagonia take the brunt of the prevailing westerlies that wail across the southern seas.
sentences.cn: 智利巴塔哥尼亚的峡湾和岛屿处于盛行西风带的冲击之下，西风哀号着吹过南部洋面。

sentences.en: Schools will bear the brunt of cuts in government spending.
sentences.cn: 政府削减开支，学校将首当其冲受到影响。
